title: Person of Interest S1-S4 Title Openings & Bloopers
author: CatchWitt
comment: Jim Caviezel answering the phone "Hey honey I'm in the middle of the take" is gold.
Seeing John (Jim) smile or laugh is still weird to me,  cause he never does either on the show.

HAHA!!!!!😂😂😂

"Jesus, can you make the wind stop blowing? Turn the heat up a bit?"

"Don't drink out of the straw!" 
" Ever? " 
"Yes!" 
" THEN WHY DO I HAVE IT? "
Oh my god when Jim was pretending to make those leaves swirl around I fucking died
description: Ultimate look back, 4 Seasons of Person of Interest's opening title sequences & gag reels (S1-S4).  Enjoy all the characters' bloopers, including Bear.
